name: Turret Defense (Minimal)
description:
Turret Defense is a shooting game but with a twist - you can’t shoot. Instead you’ll have to rely upon your trusty turrets to defend you. Your turrets require a large investment of materials which can only be obtained by killing enemies. Minimalistic visuals allow you to focus purely upon the gameplay, while the neon-rock soundtrack heightens every moment.

Contributors

  • Mark Robertson - Programmer
  • Alec Vanlint - Designer
  • Brendan Head - Sound Production
